about.title1: We’re here to make life easier
about.introTitle: Insurance hasn’t changed in more than a century
about.introText1:
Before Coverflex, we had other startups and projects.
They all involved a lot of work and a lot of passion. Blood, sweat, equity and tears. You know what it’s like.

So we know how hard it is to get a startup running. To make it grow.

To make it big.
about.introText2:
We also know how tough it can be when you run into an unexpected obstacle. When things go wrong. And the truth is, sooner or later, something will go wrong.

In that moment, it all comes down to: were you ready for it?

Are you prepared to handle it?

Most of us aren’t. Nearly 60% of SMEs aren’t insured against their top 3 perceived risks. You have to do too much paperwork, it’s too expensive, or there’s just not enough time. We know.

And we decided to do something about it. We decided to do this.

This is Coverflex.

proposition.allInOneText: Coverflex is the only fully-digital insurance solution where you buy, activate and manage all company and employee insurances with access to great benefits.
proposition.savesText:
Sync Coverflex to your social security and ERP solution and automate all the admin tasks in a management dashboard.

Finally, hassle free admin coupled with a top customer support team to assist you on every need. Including claims!

advantages.protectionSubtitle: We design our products to offer you the right protection
advantages.protectionText: Our products and bundles are designed to ensure the right protection for your company at the best price. That is why we carefully define both covers and terms, based on historical claims data to  ensure you are covered for all relevant riks without overpaying.
advantages.priceSubtitle: Cheaper, fixed monthly payment plans per employee
advantages.priceText: Pay per employee on a monthly basis. Customized plans to match your business profile and needs. The best possible offer, without excess capital and covers you don’t need. Only pay what you get.
advantages.benefitsSubtitle: Reward your team with great benefits
advantages.benefitsText: Get you team onboard. Give all your employees full access  to the insurances and benefits you’re offering them. They pick what they want.
